message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a fair deal. I'm offering it to you for $12,000. This is a great price, considering its value to you is $8,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. This is still a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $8,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $10,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob! I'll meet you halfway on your latest offer. I'll offer it to you for $10,250. This is my final concession, and I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I'm not willing to go back to our previous offers. I've already made significant concessions, and I think $10,250 is a fair price considering the product's value to you. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $10,200. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at this price. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John for $8,000.
